timeline.author: ChristianMurphy

replies.bodyText:
I think for this PR - seeing it's driven to just quickly get this hotfix done - let's leave as is for now. (As we really wanted to finish the hotfix last week.)
However, let's do this across the file, as I did want to start seeing greater usage of variables in here so as to better leverage Sass. And if you have a look, we do have extensive use of these media queries and it looks like we have four sizes in play:

768 (small)
1200 (medium)
1500 (large)
1800 (extra-large)

When we refactor that out, then we can do some more testing to make sure all the bits are still working. I think this is a fair fit with the EBP MkII we're doing for 2020.2.
